item.description:
Jingle Bells, Jangled Nerves

Do the holidays stress you out?  Buying gifts, entertaining, sending cards, attending holiday celebrations, and dealing with family issues can feel overwhelming and be too much for your already busy schedule.  Try something new this holiday season:  Take a break from hectic activities and spend a few precious moments on yourself.  Join me for this 1 hour workshop and obtain tools to ease stress during the busy holiday season and beyond.

Janine McDonald is founder of Coach for Healthy Living (www.coach4healthyliving.com). She is a Registered Nurse, Certified Health and Wellness Coach and Certified Reiki Practitioner.  She has been helping busy people make lasting lifestyle changes for over 10 years. She specializes in weight management, stress reduction,and disease management.  

We begin with a potluck lunch from 11:30 - 12:15.  The speaker presents from 12:15 - 1:15 pm.

 

$10 meetup fee

 

Include what you are bringing to the potluck when you RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: I will welcome you at the door
item.name: November Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies Meetup
